verbs.description: Sen. John McCain 's legacy [V: was] thrust into focus nearly one year ago when he announced his brain cancer diagnosis . The six - term Senator and decorated Vietnam War veteran is now fighting the illness from his beloved Arizona , and filling the role of one of the few Congressional Republican voices to publicly rebuke Trump administration decisions .
